feed.title: OliveTin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.07.13
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 3ac809c feature: Container images upgraded to Fedora 40. (#354)
  • bb90a5d feature: Use SVG icon for window maximize #343

Bug fixes

  • 9dd33bc bugfix: Empty environment variable names causing exec failures on Windows, thanks @sirjmann92 ! (#353)
  • 510c48e bugfix: Restore default theme

Others

  • 3ca3a2d Merge branch 'main' of ssh://github.com/OliveTin/OliveTin
  • 897cc0e depbump: Upgrade Go to 1.21 (#352)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.07.13

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.07.13

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.07.15
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 31d7168aac48f961a127a385c9a8bdb970c6119a feature: #350 Environment variable PORT can be used to override the default 1337, and internal services will calculate their port based on that (#358)
  • 20c4423799e7a083bd9158e6a70980a75c5d606f feature: Argument labels will end with a :, unless they end with ?, : or . already (#355)
  • 09016e1d5f1460b55ef7021a4bc747f1dc0bd3c5 feature: Entitiy data now serializes non-strings (#357)

Others

  • a1563b72ae7a811c0488d50efeba0f7ed7483adf Feature argument grid layout (#360)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.07.15

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.07.15

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!
